The video recording capability is 1080p@30fps. Its RAM and ROM have two (6/8GB/128/256GB) variants. On the other hand, it can support up to microSDXC using a dedicated slot. Certainly, F21 Pro has a 4500mAh battery with 33W fast charging. It has a dual nano-SIM card slot. That is to say, F21 Pro is 2G/3G/4G supportable. The fingerprint sensor is under the display.
